snippet: After a backlash over a plan to euthanize the state’s population of the invasive birds, the agency will revise its approach.
abstract: New York Department of Environmental Conservation says it will consider nonlethal means of controlling invasive swan species after plan to eradicate them meets backlash.
lead_paragraph: After a backlash over a plan to euthanize the state’s population of the invasive birds, the agency will revise its approach.

headline.main: New York Will Consider Nonlethal Ways to Reduce Swan Population
headline.print_headline: State to Revisit Plan to Cut Swan Population
